languages.text: "Да уж видел... Видел, как они одному из наших щитом челюсть свернули. Замешкался дорогу им освободить".
"I've seen them, all right... I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated by one of those shields. Didn't get out of the way quick enough for their liking."
languages.original_text: "Да уж видел... Видел, как они одному из наших щитом челюсть свернули. Замешкался дорогу им освободить".

traits.locale_text: "I sure have… I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated with one of those shields. The man hadn't gotten out of their way fast enough."
"I sure have… I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated with one of those shields. The man hadn't gotten out of their way fast enough."
"I've seen them, all right... I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated by one of those shields. Didn't get out of the way quick enough for their liking."
"I've seen them, all right... I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated by one of those shields. Didn't get out of the way quick enough for their liking."
"I've seen them, all right... I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated by one of those shields. Didn't get out of the way quick enough for their liking."
"I've seen them, all right... I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated by one of those shields. Didn't get out of the way quick enough for their liking."

languages.text: « Ah, ça, pour les avoir vus, je les ai vus... J'ai vu un des nôtres se faire disloquer la mâchoire par un de ces boucliers. Apparemment, il ne s'est pas poussé hors du chemin assez vite... »
languages.original_text: "I've seen them, all right... I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated by one of those shields. Didn't get out of the way quick enough for their liking."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, ça, pour les avoir vus, je les ai vus... J'ai vu un des nôtres se faire disloquer la mâchoire par un de ces boucliers. Apparemment, il ne s'est pas poussé hors du chemin assez vite... »

languages.text: "Ich hab sie gesehen, ja ... Und ich hab gesehen, wie sie einem von uns mit einem dieser Schilde die Fresse poliert haben. Hat ihnen wohl nicht schnell genug Platz gemacht."
languages.original_text: "I've seen them, all right... I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated by one of those shields. Didn't get out of the way quick enough for their liking."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hab sie gesehen, ja ... Und ich hab gesehen, wie sie einem von uns mit einem dieser Schilde die Fresse poliert haben. Hat ihnen wohl nicht schnell genug Platz gemacht."

languages.text: 「ああ、見たよ…俺たちの仲間の一人が、あの盾でアゴを外されたのをな。奴らが気に入るほど素早く退かなかったってだけの理由でな」
languages.original_text: "I've seen them, all right... I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated by one of those shields. Didn't get out of the way quick enough for their liking."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、見たよ…俺たちの仲間の一人が、あの盾でアゴを外されたのをな。奴らが気に入るほど素早く退かなかったってだけの理由でな」

languages.text: «Sí los he visto, sí... y también a uno de los nuestros acabar con la mandíbula dislocada con un golpe de uno de esos escudos. No se apartó lo bastante rápido para su gusto».
languages.original_text: "I've seen them, all right... I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated by one of those shields. Didn't get out of the way quick enough for their liking."

traits.locale_text: «Sí los he visto, sí... y también a uno de los nuestros acabar con la mandíbula dislocada con un golpe de uno de esos escudos. No se apartó lo bastante rápido para su gusto».

languages.text: “行了行了，我看到了……我还看到我们的人因为躲得慢了点，惹他们不高兴了，就挨了他们一盾牌，下巴都给打脱臼了。”
languages.original_text: "I've seen them, all right... I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated by one of those shields. Didn't get out of the way quick enough for their liking."

traits.locale_text: “行了行了，我看到了……我还看到我们的人因为躲得慢了点，惹他们不高兴了，就挨了他们一盾牌，下巴都给打脱臼了。”

languages.text: "Evet, gayet iyi bakıyorum... O kalkanlardan biri, bizimkilerden birinin çenesini paramparça etti. Yollarından çekilmediğimizde olan bu demek ki."
languages.original_text: "I've seen them, all right... I've seen one of ours get his jaw dislocated by one of those shields. Didn't get out of the way quick enough for their liking."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, gayet iyi bakıyorum... O kalkanlardan biri, bizimkilerden birinin çenesini paramparça etti. Yollarından çekilmediğimizde olan bu demek ki."
